mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is one of two copies of a printed postcard. The photograph is of Blandome with a man and woman seated in the yard at the bottom of the porch steps. The message side of the postcard is addressed to Mr. E. G. Wood, Stormout, Va. (Middlesex Co.). There is a handwritten note in addtion to the orginal message: "June 1919." There is no stamp and no cancellation.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Blandome Postcard, c. 1919 (correspondence)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Virginia -- Lexington
Dwellings
